name: Esther's
description:
At Esther's cafe your adorable host
Served cheese to the mice when they wanted toast!
That won't bother Harold's robust appetite,
But Janie insists that the order's not right.

Took 17th place in IFComp 2022.

  • "Heartwarming and funny." - Rovarsson
  • "The most finely-crafted entry I’ve played so far this year." - Rabbit
  • "There’s no other word for it: from stem to stern, it’s adorable." - Mike Russo
